Then Strings of commands pressed into one button
(https://www.tvchannellists.com/List_of_Shaw_Direct_Channels)


## Each of these are 3 key presses separated by 150ms pauses
Prefix every command with `30,38000,` which corresponds to raw-format, 38000 hz
Combine key presses with `;`
add pauses with `P150`

MSNBC 260
30,38000,4956,1998,970,2988,970,1034,994,1038,968,1036,992,2966,994,1034,970,1036,994,1036,968,1036,994,2962,998,2986,970,1034,940;P150;30,38000,4956,1998,970,2988,968,2990,916,1114,968,2990,968,2988,970,1036,994,1036,968,1036,992,2966,994,2988,968,1036,938,3020,964;P150;30,38000,4978,1998,968,1036,960,1070,968,2988,970,1034,992,1038,970,2988,970,1036,1022,1008,970,1036,996,2960,996,2988,970,1036,962
